    Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Interface IViewModelCommon

    Encapsulates implementations of System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged and System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo and adds PropertyValueChanged event which is raised in tandem with System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged except it provides addition data like old value and new value.

    Inherited Members

    Syntax
    public interface IViewModelCommon : INotifyDataErrorInfo, IProgressReporterCommon, INotifyPropertyChanged

    | Improve this Doc View Source

    GetPropertyErrors(String)

    Gets all error messages of the specified property. If the propertyName is null all error messages will be returned.

    Declaration
    IEnumerable<string> GetPropertyErrors(string propertyName = null)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.String propertyName

    The of the property of which the error messages should be returned.
    Returns
    Type Description
    System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.String>

    Returns an System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T> containing all error messages of the specified property.
    Remarks

    If the propertyName is null all current error messages will be returned.

    | Improve this Doc View Source

    PropertyHasError(String)

    Checks whether the specified property has errors or is valid.

    Declaration
    bool PropertyHasError(string propertyName = null)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.String propertyName

    The name of the property to check for errors.
    Returns
    Type Description
    System.Boolean

    true when the specified property has at least one error. Otherwise false when the property is valid.

    PropertyValueChanged

    PropertyChanged implementation that sends old value and new value of the change and raises the INotifyPropertyChanged event.
